backend/main.mo: Defines actor state and data types for tasks, decisions, user profiles, avatars, and overtime, including default dental avatar data structures.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking task‑editing and i18n changes to specific frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lists concise descriptions of many frontend components, hooks, pages, and translation files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions for light/dark modes plus global styling rules.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point mounting the root element and loading the main TypeScript bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level app deciding between loading screen, login flow, or authenticated app based on identity state.
frontend/src/components/auth/Authenticat: Controls post-login flow: handles role/profile loading, errors, onboarding, and showing the main app shell.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginScreen: Login UI letting users choose assistant or manager, optionally provide manager token, and trigger identity login.
frontend/src/components/auth/RoleChoiceS: UI for choosing assistant or manager role, with token input, persisted pending selections, and submission to role-selection hooks.
frontend/src/components/avatars/avatarMa: Empty placeholder file for avatar manifest.
frontend/src/components/avatars/AvatarPi: Loads available dental avatars and displays a selectable grid with loading, error, and empty states.
frontend/src/components/avatars/DentalAv: Renders an SVG avatar from lookup or shows a deterministic fallback when missing or invalid.
frontend/src/components/avatars/Generate: Generates a pastel-colored SVG avatar based on initials with a stylized tooth and text.
frontend/src/components/avatars/ProfileA: Chooses between profile photo, dental SVG avatar, or generated avatar based on provided props.
frontend/src/components/badges/badges.ts: Defines the badge interface and a list of static badge definitions with icons and translation keys.
frontend/src/components/badges/BadgeShel: Displays all badges in a sheet, indicating earned status and showing badge details.
frontend/src/components/common/QueryErro: Full-screen fallback showing an error message and retry button for failed queries.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Top navigation header with logo, theme and language controls, user menu, badges, and settings.
Main application layout with header, tab navigation, admin-aware manager tab, and footer.
frontend/src/components/layout/LanguageS: Dropdown for selecting the app's language from predefined options.
frontend/src/components/layout/ThemeTogg: Button that toggles between light and dark themes using next-themes.
frontend/src/components/manager/TaskAudi: Displays a table of completed tasks with user info, comments, and before/after photo indicators.
frontend/src/components/manager/TaskComp: Generates a bar chart showing completed task counts per user.
frontend/src/components/manager/UserPick: Provides a select dropdown for choosing a user, showing avatars and usernames.
frontend/src/components/navigation/TabNa: Renders a horizontal tab navigation bar with active-state styling.
frontend/src/components/overtime/Overtim: A composite date input with synced native date picker restricted to the last two months.
Form for creating overtime entries with validation, date selection, and submission handling.
Lists past overtime entries sorted by date, showing minutes added or deducted with icons.
Calculates and displays total overtime minutes and formatted composite time.
frontend/src/components/profile/PrivacyP: Panel for exporting local data and clearing user data, including logout and confirmation dialog.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileO: Modal for initial user profile setup, letting users enter username/initials and pick dental, generated, or photo avatars with optional photo upload. Handles validation, upload progress, and saving the completed profile.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileP: Photo upload field with validation, preview, removal, and upload progress display. Provides UI controls for selecting or changing a profile image.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Settings panel for editing an existing user profile, including username, initials, avatar selection, and photo upload or removal. Supports privacy settings navigation and saving profile changes.
frontend/src/components/tasks/CompleteTa: Dialog for marking a task complete with an optional comment and before/after photos. Converts uploaded images to blobs and submits completion data.
frontend/src/components/tasks/CreateTask: Dialog for creating a new task with title, description, and type selection. Validates required fields and submits the new task.
frontend/src/components/tasks/EditTaskDi: Dialog for editing an existing task’s title, description, and type. Pre-fills fields from the task and saves updates on submission.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskCard.t: Displays a task card with styling, completion/edit actions, and reset logic using dialogs and hooks.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskList.t: Sorts tasks by completion and priority, then renders a list of TaskCard components or an empty-state message.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthz.ts: Fetches the caller's user role and admin status using the actor instance.
frontend/src/hooks/useBadges.ts: Computes earned badges based on overtime entries and completed tasks.
frontend/src/hooks/useDentalAvatars.ts: Fetches dental avatars from the backend and provides lookup by ID.
frontend/src/hooks/useI18n.ts: Returns the i18n context and ensures it's used within the provider.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Handles Internet Identity login, identity persistence, and context management for authentication.
frontend/src/hooks/useManagerOvertime.ts: Fetches overtime entries for a specific user and prepares export-friendly overtime data.
frontend/src/hooks/useManagerTasks.ts: Provides a query to export all task data from the backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotify.ts: Wraps toast notifications and normalizes error messages for display.
frontend/src/hooks/useOvertime.ts: Retrieves caller overtime entries and provides mutation to create new entries.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file noting that feature-specific hooks reside elsewhere.
frontend/src/hooks/useRoleSelection.ts: Mutations to select assistant or manager roles and refresh related authorization queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useTasks.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching, creating, editing, completing, and resetting tasks with optimistic updates and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Defines hooks to fetch, update, and manage user profiles and photos through React Query and the backend actor.
frontend/src/i18n/I18nProvider.tsx: Sets up an i18n context with language persistence and translation lookup.
frontend/src/i18n/translations.ts: Exports supported languages and a large nested translation object for UI strings.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for themes, plus utility animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with Internet Identity and React Query providers.
frontend/src/pages/manager/ManagerDashbo: Manager dashboard with tabbed navigation for overtime management and statistics.
frontend/src/pages/manager/ManagerOverti: Allows managers to view users' overtime entries, totals, and export them to CSV.
frontend/src/pages/manager/ManagerStatsP: Manager stats page that loads tasks and profiles, renders charts/logs, and allows exporting task data to CSV via the actor canister.
frontend/src/pages/OvertimePage.tsx: Displays overtime form, totals, and history using localization and overtime hooks.
frontend/src/pages/TasksPage.tsx: Shows task list and creation UI and auto-checks for recurring task resets.
frontend/src/utils/csv.ts: Utility that converts an array of objects to CSV, escapes values, and triggers a browser download.
frontend/src/utils/overtimeTime.ts: Overtime utilities defining a 450‑minute workday and formatting minutes into days, hours, and minutes.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and handling hash‑based parameter extraction.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration with extended color tokens, container settings, animations, and layout plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata capturing current state, architecture notes, known issues, and feature definitions for the FitGebit Team Tracker app.
